criterion: Provides a clear and concise explanation of the recommended dose escalation intervals and typical maximum tolerated doses for adult patients.

Correctly advises the user to consult with a medical professional or the relevant standard practice parameters for further guidance.
Fails to provide any information about the recommended dose escalation intervals and typical maximum tolerated doses for adult patients.
Incorrectly states that the recommended dose escalation intervals and typical maximum tolerated doses for adult patients are the same as for pediatric patients.
